summary: STEERING WHEEL SHAKES WHEN BRAKING FROM 50-60 MPH SPEED.  ROTORS ARE WARPED FOR THE SECOND TIME IN 2 YEARS.  ADVISED TO REPLACE FRONT BRAKES AND REPAIR ROTORS.  ADVISED BY TECHNICIAN AT JEEP DEALERSHIP THAT NUMEROUS PROBLEMS  WITH THIS EXACT ISSUE FROM 1999 TO 2002 JEEPS.  DEFINITE SAFETY ISSUE AS STEERING WHEEL WILL BEGIN TO SHAKE UNCONTROLLABLY.  *NLM
